Subject: Coloring Book Hand Embroidery
Description: Learn how to take your favorite coloring book page and turn it into a beautiful piece of hand embroidery. Some prior knowledge of embroidery is helpful, but not required.  Speakers include:Kim Ulrich - Track: DIY  - Duration: 1 hour

Subject: Make Your Own Pillowcase
Description: Join me in sewing your very own pillowcase. Learn how to use a sewing machine while making something useful!  Speakers include:Kim Ulrich - Track: DIY  - Duration: 1 hour
